roleset.name: to detail something

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: It appears that the American people have very firm views about immigration and that [the President and other politicians]-1 are kind of trying PRO-1 to nuance the issue.

example.name: all args
example.text: Native American art was the initial spark, then our artists nuanced the soft print with chic patterns.

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in ON-miss. Framed by Claire
